events.title: Completion of Trump World Tower
events.description: Donald Trump finalizes the 72-story luxury Trump World Tower across from the UN in Manhattan, financed partly by Daewoo Group. It becomes one of the world's tallest residential buildings.

moneyFlow.description: The Trump World Tower was a $300 million project developed by Trump with partners including Daewoo of South Korea. Completed in 2001, the 72-story luxury condominium building was financed through a combination of partnerships, construction loans from Deutsche Bank, and pre-sales of condominium units to buyers worldwide.

entity-001.name: Donald J. Trump
entity-001.description: Real estate developer and businessman. In 2001, completed the prestigious Trump World Tower in Manhattan, adding to his portfolio of high-profile properties.
